data.answer: It is a promising functional scaffold for practical applications due to its unique properties.

data.question: True or False: The MOF discussed in the article has a low condensation degree.

data.question: True or False: The discussed MOF has a low surface area.

data.answer: A decrease in the crystallinity and stability of the resulting materials.
